statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: For this problem, you will write a program that prints the Nth largest value in a fixed sized array of integers. To make things simple, N will be 3 and the array will always be have 10 decimal integer values.

statement.title: Input
statement.content: The first line of input contains a single integer P, (1 �� P �� 1000), which is the number of data sets that follow. Each data set consists of a single line containing the data set number, followed by a space,followed by 10 space separated decimal integers whose values are between 1 and 1000 inclusive.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each data set, generate one line of output with the following values: The data set number as a decimal integer, a space, and the 3<sup>rd</sup> largest value of the corresponding 10 integers.
